caption.center: Crotty v. Trader[fn*] and Birbrower, Montalbano, Condon Frank v.

opinion_text.footnote_body: [fn*] Rehearing granted. See 50 Cal.App.4th 765 for subsequent opinion.
[fn†] Review granted. Reprinted without change in the Review Granted Opinions Pamphlet to permit tracking pending review and disposition by the Supreme Court.

opinion.opinion_text: [EDITORS' NOTE: PAGES 795 — 811 CONTAINING CROTTY v. TRADER AND BIRBROWER, MONTALBANO, CONDON FRANK v. SUPERIOR COURT HAVE BEEN OMITTED.]Page 812
